庶.definition: (bound form) ordinary; numerous; (bound form) pertaining to a concubine (contrasted with 嫡[di2])

庶出.definition: born of a concubine (rather than of the wife)

庶吉士.definition: title of the temporary position in the Hanlin Academy 翰林院[Han4lin2yuan4] conferred on meritorious candidates until the next examination

庶幾.definition: (literary) similar; almost; (literary) if only; it is to be hoped that; (literary) maybe; perhaps

庶民.definition: the multitude of common people (in highbrow literature); plebeian
